definition: to drop/to fall/to come down/to descend
breath/news/interest (on an investment or loan)/to cease/to stop/to rest/Taiwan pr. [xi2]

sentences.english: The rate cuts will soothe a little bit of jangled nerves at this time.
sentences.chinese: 這時降息可以稍稍平息人們雜亂的神經。

sentences.english: It would lower them if it could.
sentences.chinese: 如果有可能，它還會降息。

sentences.english: The cut was good news for homeowners.
sentences.chinese: 這一降息對屋主來說是好消息。

sentences.english: The Bank of England's minutes for its rate decision, where members cut 100bps, will be released this morning.
sentences.chinese: 今天上午英國央行公佈利率決定，降息100個基點。

sentences.english: The call for the rate cut came despite the efforts by the Fed to unclog the financial system.
sentences.chinese: 儘管美聯儲努力疏通金融體系，但降息呼聲日高。

sentences.english: The markets greeted the first cut with a sneer.
sentences.chinese: 市場帶着冷笑迎接第一次降息。

sentences.english: The measure was indeed out of the market anticipations, and the central bank would cut interest rates.
sentences.chinese: 而且此舉將是市場預期，央行接下來可能還會降息。
這也是我們所得到的降息幅度。

definition: abbr. for various central banks, notably 中國人民銀行|中国人民银行[Zhong1 guo2 Ren2 min2 Yin2 hang2] and 中央銀行|中央银行[Zhong1 yang1 Yin2 hang2]

pinyin: cun2 kuan3 zhun3 bei4 jin1 lu:4

definition: US Federal Reserve (Fed), the US central bank
